feed.title: Cleanuparr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix base paths being incorrectly configured for download clients by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.1...v2.0.2

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: v2.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix download cleaner categories not being fetched by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/177

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.2...v2.0.3

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix jobs not being scheduled according to the cron expression by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/187
  • Fix some small UI stuff by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/185
  • Change icon direction for UI accordions by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/182
  • Remove right-side icons from settings cards by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/183
  • Add health check endpoints by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/181

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.3...v2.0.4

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix docs broken links by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/190

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.4...v2.0.5

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Readarr support by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/191

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.5...v2.0.6
